entry.title: Pockit: A tiny, powerful, modular computer (2022 demo)

media:group.media:title: Pockit: A tiny, powerful, modular computer (2022 demo)
media:group.media:description:
• Project details + signup at http://pockit.ai
• This video is a demo of modular electronics with Pockit as of March 2022, after several upgrades in the recent months based on the community's feedback.
• Discussion group: http://reddit.com/r/pockit

media:group.media:title: Pockit Dashboard: A little demo
media:group.media:description: Check out more details + pictures at https://pockit.ai

entry.title: A small, plug-and-play Linux computer — with Raspberry Pi (Project POCKIT)

media:group.media:title: A small, plug-and-play Linux computer — with Raspberry Pi (Project POCKIT)
media:group.media:description:
More details + signup at https://pockit.ai
This video shows POCKIT + a tiny bit of Raspberry Pi, to put together a rearrangeable Linux PC.
And here's the Block teardown mentioned in the video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0d32ViJT7o8

entry.title: Smart Indoor Gardening in minutes — Wireless, Automatic (Project POCKIT)

media:group.media:title: Smart Indoor Gardening in minutes — Wireless, Automatic (Project POCKIT)
media:group.media:description: More details + signup at https://pockit.ai Join the discussion at https://facebook.com/groups/pockit This video shows POCKIT applied for a powerful indoor-gardening application, much more easily than soldering and wiring up a bunch of breakout boards with an Arduino or Raspberry Pi.

entry.title: Handwashing: Automatic Soap Dispenser — Gesture-activated (Project POCKIT)

media:group.media:title: Handwashing: Automatic Soap Dispenser — Gesture-activated (Project POCKIT)
media:group.media:description: More details + signup at https://pockit.ai Join the discussion at https://facebook.com/groups/pockit This video shows the use of POCKIT blocks (together with some LEGO blocks) to build a smart handwashing soap dispenser that gets activated by hand presence, and then plays music + an LED-matrix-animation for a pre-set amount of time.

entry.title: A brief teardown of modular electronic blocks (Project POCKIT)

media:group.media:title: A brief teardown of modular electronic blocks (Project POCKIT)
media:group.media:description: More details + signup at https://pockit.ai Join the discussion at https://facebook.com/groups/pockit This video presents a short internal view of a typical Pockit block. Both the electronics and mechanical details are shown.

entry.title: Intro to modular electronic blocks (Project POCKIT)

media:group.media:title: Intro to modular electronic blocks (Project POCKIT)
media:group.media:description: More details + signup at https://pockit.ai Join the discussion at https://facebook.com/groups/pockit This video introduces the concept of POCKIT, with an example demo of an alarm-clock build, then a summary of the modular-blocks story, and finally ending with an e-paper version of a clock/BitCoin-ticker/notifier.
